DataElement.preferredDefinition: the date on which the primary adverse event ended.

DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: information related to the end date or occurrence of the primary adverse event.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: Occurring first in time or sequence; original. (American Heritage Dictionary):Any unfavorable and unintended sign (including an abnormal laboratory finding), symptom, syndrome, or disease, temporally associated with the use of a medical product or procedure, regardless of whether or not it is considered related to the product or procedure (attribution of unrelated, unlikely, possible, probable, or definite). The concept refers to events that could be medical product related, dose related, route related, patient related, caused by an interaction with another therapy or procedure, or caused by opioid initiation or dose escalation. The term also is referred to as an adverse experience. The old term Side Effect is retired and should not be used.

Concepts.definition: Occurring first in time or sequence; original; of greatest rank or importance or value.

Any unfavorable or unintended disease, sign, or symptom (including an abnormal laboratory finding) that is temporally associated with the use of a medical treatment or procedure, and that may or may not be considered related to the medical treatment or procedure. Such events can be related to the intervention, dose, route of administration, patient, or caused by an interaction with another drug(s) or procedure(s).

Property.preferredDefinition: The point or place at which something terminates in time, space, or extent.:Occurrence; an instance of something happening.

Concepts.definition: The point or place at which something terminates in time, space, or extent.
An instance of something happening, such as an event or incident.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition:
any unfavorable symptoms, signs, or disease temporally associated with the use of a medical
treatment or procedure that may or may not be considered related to the medical
treatment or procedure.

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: The date on which an observation or an event ended.

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: A particular day specified as the time something has, or will, happen.

Concepts.definition: The particular day, month and year an event has happened or will happen.

ValueDomain.changeDescription: 8/23/17 jk transferred context, cap first letter in def, and added CSI, registration status per Round 5 finalization task.

DataElement.origin: ADEERS:NCI/CTEP Adverse Event Expedited Report System
